attributes.action: Start proportional representation in all elections.
attributes.additional_details: To further democracy and reflect that the government is accountable to the public.
attributes.background: Proportional representation to better represent constituencies.

rejection.details:
We understand you want elections to be held under a proportional representation system, however it's not clear whether you want this to apply to local and general elections, or just general elections. It's also not clear what form of proportional representation you want to see implemented. 

You may like to sign these petitions which call for related actions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574784
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560420
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585600
